hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Ice Arrows#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Market#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Green Rupee# and #an Ice Trap#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to the #Water Medallion#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Talon's House#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Have you ever tried hammering the ground or wall in a room with Torch Slugs, Flare Dancers, Tektites, Walltulas, Scrubs or Deku Babas?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Bombchu Shop#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #4# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #6# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the earth is round.^Just like pizza.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #an Ice Cavern Compass# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to the #Forest Medallion#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Huge Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #the hero#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Lon Lon Tower#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #6# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
